page.title: 07Education.
page.content:
A Typical School Day.
I get up at 7 o'clock and watch television for fifteen minutes. While my dad is getting ready for work my mum is making the breakfast. My dad sets off for the Co-op where he works and I have my Weetabix. Then I get dressed and pack my school bag. I go to my neighbours as they give me a lift to school. I play tig until the bell is rung and then we have Assembly. Then we measure our sunflowers because we are trying to help children in need by asking friends to sponsor our sunflowers. On Tuesdays we go swimming, we are practising for the Gala. After swimming we finish work and do corrections. After lunch we may have art and then rounders which I like very much.
